---
id: delete-webhook
title: "DeleteWebhook"
description: "Permanently removes a webhook config from the workspace, stopping all future event notifications to that endpoint."

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/webhook/{name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently removes a webhook config from the workspace, stopping all future event notifications to that endpoint.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
